title: Disgusting ping`
body: Is it possible that maybe you guys could maintain your servers or whatever the f/uck keeps peoples ping true to form instead of spending all your maintenance money on what i can only assume is rectally administered crack cocaine. Haven't a game that my ping hasn't ranged from 30 - 500 in about 3 weeks. get your shit together

replies.body:
>rectally administered crack cocaine

I actually cracked up laughing at that one.
Have you ever thought about the fact that it might not be the servers, but your internet connection?
